sections.heading: TL;DR (Too Long; Didn’t Read)
content: <ul class="list-disc list-outside mb-4 space-y-1 pl-5">
• TrailPacing is a personal, on-device hiking tool for distance and interval notifications.
• No accounts, no servers, no ads. You control permissions (Location, Notifications, Health data).
• Use TrailPacing at your own risk. It is not a safety, medical, or primary navigation device. Always carry appropriate maps, a compass, and safety equipment.
• We limit our liability to the extent permitted by law. See Disclaimers and Limitation of Liability.

sections.heading: Introduction
content: These Terms of Use (“Terms”) govern your use of TrailPacing (the “App”, “we”, “us”). By installing or using the App, you agree to these Terms. If you do not agree, do not use the App.

TrailPacing provides distance tracking, interval notifications, and related hiking metrics. Features depend on device capabilities and permissions you grant (e.g., Location, Notifications, Health data).
If you have questions about these Terms, contact us.

• Licence. We grant you a personal, revocable, non-exclusive, non-transferable licence to use the App on devices you own or control, in accordance with these Terms and the App Store rules.
• Personal use. The App is for personal, non-commercial use unless we agree otherwise in writing.
• Requirements. You are responsible for having a compatible device, sufficient battery, and connectivity (where required).
• Permissions. Some features require Location, Notifications, or optional Health data access. You can change permissions in iOS Settings at any time; related features may then not function.

• No reliance. The App provides training and informational outputs. It is not a substitute for professional instruction, emergency services, or primary navigation. GPS/altitude readings can be inaccurate due to terrain, weather, or device limitations.
• Safety. Do not use the App where using a device could be unsafe. Stay aware of surroundings and comply with laws, park rules, and access restrictions.

content: <ul class="list-disc list-outside mb-4 space-y-1 pl-5">
